description: [Gazer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0168) creates a mutex using the hard-coded value `{531511FA-190D-5D85-8A4A-279F2F592CC7}` to ensure that only one instance of itself is running.(Citation: ESET Gazer Aug 2017)
